solution_line_template: The original length of the bathroom is {original_area} sq ft/{original_width} ft = <<{original_area}/{original_width}={original_length}>>{original_length} ft
The new length of the bathroom is {original_length}ft + {extension_length} ft = <<{original_length}+{extension_length}={new_length}>>{new_length} ft
The new width of the bathroom is {original_width} ft + {extension_width} ft = <<{original_width}+{extension_width}={new_width}>>{new_width} ft
The new area of the bathroom is {new_length}ft x {new_width} ft = <<{new_length}*{new_width}={new_area}>>{new_area} sq ft
